description:
Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units include a seating area where you can relax. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available in all rooms and throughout the whole property.
Diamond Plaza is 200 m from Hotel Des Arts Saigon Mgallery Coll, while Notre Dame Church is 400 m from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 6 km from the property.

This colonial-style 1920 landmark sits in the heart of Ho Chi Minh city and overlooks the Saigon River. Offering boutique-style accommodation, Hotel Majestic Saigon also houses an outdoor pool, a restaurant and skybar. Guests can also indulge in pampering massage at Areca Health Club or have a good workout at the gym. Free WiFi access is available in all areas.
Fitted with old-fashioned telephone and wood furniture, all units feature windows offering plenty of natural lights, air conditioning and personal safe. A flat-screen TV and minibar are included. Selected units come with tea/coffee machine, and/or has a private balcony with views. A colonial-style marble bathroom is also included, equipped with either a bathtub or shower facility, free toiletries and a hairdryer.
Hotel Majestic Saigon also has a casino. Fluently conversed in English and French, staff at the tour desk and 24-hour front desk can assist you with a variety of services, including currency exchange, luggage storage, day tour arrangement, airport transfer and car rental.

Reunification Palace, Opera House and Notre Dame Cathedral are 6 km away. Ibis Saigon Airport offers 24-hour airport transfers.
Guests can work out at the hotel’s gym or relax in the steam and sauna area. Luggage storage services are available at the 24-hour front desk. The hotel also has meeting and banquet facilities.
The Oopen Restaurant serves breakfast from 04:30 12:00 and features an open kitchen. A selection of beer, tea and coffee, along with Eastern and Western dishes can be ordered here.

Featuring classic contemporary interiors and designs, The Myst Dong Khoi offers a sophisticated accommodation in the heart of District 1 in Ho Chi Minh City. Guests can enjoy a relaxing dip in the rooftop pool, or simply enjoy views of city by the Saigon River from the pool deck.
The Myst Dong Khoi features free WiFi throughout the property. Bilingual staff are available 24 hours a day to assist you at the front desk. The property also houses a spa, fitness centre and a tour desk. Complimentary afternoon tea is offered at the restaurant for in house guests.
Opera House is 350 m from The Myst Dong Khoi, while Ho Chi Minh City Hall is 550 m away. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is 8 km from the property.

Local attractions including the Saigon River, Reunification Palace, Opera House and Notre Dame Cathedral are 1.5 km away. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is a 45-minute drive from Pullman Saigon Centre.
Guests can work out at the hotel’s fitness centre or relax at the sauna and spa pool. Luggage storage services are available at the 24-hour reception.
The rooftop restaurant serves breakfast and has a unique circle grill concept and live show kitchen. A selection of Vietnamese beer, tea and coffee along with Eastern and Western dishes can be ordered from the lobby bar.

A short 3-minute's walk from the property can take you to Notre Dame Cathedral and Reunification Palace. Ben Thanh Market is a 10-minute's drive from InterContinental Residences Saigon, an IHG Hotel, while Tan Son Nhat International Airport can be reached within 45-minute driving distance.
Guests can take a yoga class at the fitness centre or relax with professional massage at the spa centre. The property offers free private on-site parking.
Basilico offers delicious Italian food, while authentic Cantonese and Peking dishes can be sampled at Yu Chu, and international cuisine will be served at Market 39. InterContinental Residences Saigon, an IHG Hotel is linked to the M Plaza Saigon, which offers numerous shopping and other dining options.

All well-appointed units are adorned in pleasant cream shade with splashes of grey and light beige from the farbics, and fitted with large bay windows enjoying sweeping views of the city or river. Spacious units also come equipped with a seating area with sofa, cable flat-screen TV and personal safe. En suite bathroom has a bathtub, shower and free toiltries.
Within walking distance, guests can reach many popular tourist attractions of the city, including the iconic Bitexco Financial Tower, Opera House, City Hall and Ben Thanh Market. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is a 30-minute drive from Renaissance Riverside Hotel Saigon.
Viet Kitchen features modern dining setting and serves a wide range of Vietnamese  and international dishes, while Kabin offers authentic Cantonese cuisine. Guests can unwind at the Liquid Sky Bar on the rooftop, or enjoy a favourite beverage at Atrium Lounge.

The contemporary guestrooms are all equipped with a flat-screen TV, personal safe and minibar. Some rooms types have an espresso machine and an iPod dock. En suite bathrooms have either a shower or bathtub.
Guests can exercise at the fitness centre, or relax with a massage at Inbalance Spa. The hotel also provides meeting rooms, laundry services and a 24-hour front desk.
International buffet spreads are offered at The Square restaurant. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed at 167 Faubourg lobby bar.

Conveniently located in the business and shopping district, Somerset Ho Chi Minh City offers resort-style serviced apartments with free high-speed internet access and an outdoor swimming pool with spa tub.
The elegant and spacious apartments at Somerset Ho Chi Minh are fully furnished in contemporary decor. Each apartment features a kitchen, home entertainment system, free broadband internet access and work desk.
Recreation facilities include a fully-equipped fitness centre, tennis court and barbeque area while a convenience store is also available.

Set 200 m from Ben Thanh Market, WE HOME BEN THANH offers air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi.
A car rental service is available at the apartment.
Popular points of interest near WE HOME BEN THANH include Fine Arts Museum, Ben Thanh Street Food Market and Tao Dan Park. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International, 12 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Luxurious and elegant, the air-conditioned rooms at Park Hyatt Saigon all come with a 48-inch LED TV, Bose Bluetooth speaker, and Nespresso coffee maker, mini iPad. Rooms also have individually controlled air conditioning, free WiFi access and round-the-clock private butler service. Bathrooms are equipped with a soaking tub and a walk-in rainshower. Ironing facilities are included.
The cosy Opera restaurant serves Italian cuisine, while the stylish Square One offers Vietnamese and French delights. The hotel also features the modern and popular 2 Lam Son bar and the elegant Park Lounge, which offers afternoon tea in a casual setting. Guests may also enjoy rejuvenating wellness treatments utilising traditional Vietnamese rituals and ingredients at Xuan Spa or exercise at the fitness centre.
Park Hyatt Saigon is within walking distance of Notre Dame Cathedral, Central Post Office and the Reunification Palace. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

Lotus Central Hotel features a restaurant, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and bar in Ho Chi Minh City. Among the facilities at this property are a tour desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.
The accommodation also provides a business centre and guests can use the fax machine and photocopier at Lotus Central Hotel. Lotus Central Hotel offers a sun terrace.
Popular points of interest near the hotel include Fine Arts Museum, Takashimaya Vietnam and Ben Thanh Street Food Market. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International, 13 km from Lotus Central Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Situated beside Now Zone Shopping Mall, this 5-star property features modern rooms with cable flat-screen TV and bathroom. The property features a full-service spa, an outdoor pool and fitness facilities.
Hotel Nikko Saigon also has a business centre and concierge services. Guests can enjoy the hot tub and a wide selection of spa services at the property.
Hotel Nikko Saigon is a 10-minute drive from Saigon Opera House, Notre Dame Cathedral and the Reunification Palace. It is a 25-minute drive from Tan Son Nhat International Airport and has free parking.

8B Aparthotel offers an indoor swimming pool and a fitness room, as well as air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi in Ho Chi Minh City, 5 km from Tan Dinh Market.
The aparthotel offers 3-star accommodation with a sauna.
Giac Lam Pagoda is 5 km from 8B Aparthotel, while Reunification Palace is 5 km away. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 6 km from the accommodation.

Conveniently situated in Ho Chi Minh city centre, Prostyle Hotel Ho Chi Minh provides contemporary accommodation in District 1. Featuring an on-site restaurant, the hotel also has a sauna room and business centre.
Featuring free WiFi access, all rooms are furnished with air conditioning, a seating area with desk and personal safe. A satellite TV and minibar are provided. En suite bathroom in each room has a bathtub or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include bathrobes and slippers for your convenience.
The hotel operates a 24-hour front desk where bilingual staff can assist with currency exchange, luggage storage and express check-in or check-out. Car rental, airport transfers, shuttle services and day trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Free private parking is possible on site.

Situated in Ho Chi Minh City, 2.7 km from Diamond Plaza and 2.8 km from Landmark 81, KunKin Luxury Apartment & Hotel features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a restaurant and a fitness centre.
A car rental service is available at the apartment.
Saigon Central Post Office is 2.9 km from KunKin Luxury Apartment & Hotel, while Vietnam History Museum is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

Ideally located in the Tan Binh district of Ho Chi Minh City, Hera Hotel Airport is set 3.9 km from Giac Lam Pagoda, 5 km from Tan Dinh Market and 5 km from Reunification Palace. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.
A à la carte breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation.
Vietnam History Museum is 6 km from Hera Hotel Airport, while War Remnants Museum is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

On the banks of the scenic Saigon River, the 4-star Riverside Serviced Apartments come with free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and 2 tennis courts. A free scheduled boat or bus transfer brings guests to and from Bach Dang Port.
Spread over 13 buildings, the air-conditioned apartments all come with a living room and full kitchen facilities. A cable TV, oven and stove are included. A private balcony enjoys views of the garden or river.  En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower.
The hotel is a 45-minute drive from Saigon Train Station and a 25-minute drive from Tan Son Nhat International Airport. Parking is free.

Set in Ho Chi Minh City, within 2.9 km of Giac Lam Pagoda and 3.8 km of War Remnants Museum, Bonita THT offers accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is located 3.8 km from Ben Thanh Street Food Market, 3.9 km from Reunification Palace and 3.9 km from Tao Dan Park. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.
At Bonita THT guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub and a sauna.
Tan Dinh Market is 4.1 km from the accommodation, while Ho Chi Minh City Museum is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 10 km from Bonita THT.

Situated on Thu Khoa Huan St, Silverland Yen Hotel is just a 6-minute walk to Ben Thanh Market. The hotel boasts a warm-water outdoor hot tub and sauna/steam bath facility.
All rooms have air conditioning, a desk and flat screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms feature views of the city and carpeted floor. An en suite bathroom comes equipped with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Free WiFi access is available in all rooms.
There is a 24-hour front desk at the property where staff can assist with a variety of services, including luggage storage, ticket service and tour arrangements. Other facilities at Silverland Yen Hotel include a fitness room and business centre.

Stylish rooms, studios and suites offer spacious interiors with modern amenities. Each includes an iPod dock, tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All come with a large marble bathroom.
Saigon Cafe features international cuisine coupled with authentic local flavours. Chinese and Cantonese specialities can be enjoyed at Li Bai Restaurant. Light meals and refreshing coffee drinks can be found at The Lounge. Guests can end a long day with a cocktail at the rooftop bar.
Hotel Saigon & Towers Sheraton is 800 m from Notre Dame Cathedral and the Saigon Centre. It is 2 km from War Remnants Museum, 5 km from Cholon Chinatown, and 6.5 km from Tan Son Nhat international Airport.

Situated in Ho Chi Minh City, 1.5 km from Tan Dinh Market and 2.6 km from War Remnants Museum, The Arrivals Tower-Near Airport-10 stars features accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a restaurant and a bar.
Guests at the apartment can enjoy a à la carte or an American breakfast.
The Arrivals Tower-Near Airport-10 offers a terrace.

Placed in the heart of Ho Chi Minh City, Silverland Sakyo Hotel features a blend of Saigon's soul and the serenity of Japanese culture. The hotel boasts a rooftop pool, 2 on-site restaurants and bars. You can enjoy rejuvenating treatments at KL Spa or simply relax in the lounge area. Complimentary internet access is also avaialble.
Rooms are luxuriously furnished and fully air-conditioned. A minibar, a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee making facilities are included. The attached bathrooms come with a hairdryer and plush bathrobes. Some rooms offer a stand-alone bathtub.
Enjoy a cup of tea while you relax at the terrace or indulge in a traditional massage. Sauna and steam bath facilities, currency exchange services, a 24-hour reception and a business centre are all available.

Immerse yourself in the joy of travelling when spending time in Alagon D'antique Hotel & Spa's rooftop, where you can dip in the swimming pool and take in the stunning panoramic city view, relax in the hot tub, chill out with a refreshing drink at the bar, or have high tea in the sky garden every day. The hotel also features a spa with sauna and steam bath facilities, fitness room, and an on-site restaurant. Guests have free WiFi access in entire area.
All rooms have a flat-screen TV. Some rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and free toiletries.
Speaking 5 languages, friendly staff at the front desk and tour desk are willing to assist you round the clock with a variety of services, including currency exchange, luggage storage, tour arrangement, and airport transfer.

Located in Ho Chi Minh City, 1.2 km from Vietnam History Museum and 2.1 km from Union Square Saigon Shopping Mall, The Bloom Pham Viet Chanh provides accommodation with free WiFi, air conditioning, a restaurant and a bar.
Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast.
The Bloom Pham Viet Chanh offers a hot tub. The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying.

Ben Thanh Market and Ho Chi Minh Fine Arts Museum are 1 km from the property, while Reunification Palace is 1.4 km away and Notre-Dame Cathedral is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International, 8 km from Duc Vuong Hotel.
The hotel operates a 24-hour front desk where staff can assist with luggage storage, currency exchange and other concierge services. Bicycle/car rental and airport transfers can be arranged upon request at a fee.

Set in Ho Chi Minh City, within 2.9 km of Giac Lam Pagoda and 3.8 km of War Remnants Museum, Bonita THT offers accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is located 3.8 km from Ben Thanh Street Food Market, 3.9 km from Reunification Palace and 3.9 km from Tao Dan Park. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.
At Bonita THT guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub and a sauna.
Tan Dinh Market is 4.1 km from the accommodation, while Ho Chi Minh City Museum is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 10 km from Bonita THT.
Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Queen Central Hotel offers accommodation in the heart of bustling Ho Chi Minh City. Guests can enjoy meals in the on-site restaurant. Queen Central Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property.
Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a bath or a shower.
Guests can approach the 24-hour front desk at the property for currency exchange, ticketing and tour services.

The contemporary guestrooms are all equipped with a flat-screen TV, personal safe and minibar. Some rooms types have an espresso machine and an iPod dock. En suite bathrooms have either a shower or bathtub.
Guests can exercise at the fitness centre, or relax with a massage at Inbalance Spa. The hotel also provides meeting rooms, laundry services and a 24-hour front desk.
International buffet spreads are offered at The Square restaurant. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed at 167 Faubourg lobby bar.

Reunification Palace, Opera House and Notre Dame Cathedral are 6 km away. Ibis Saigon Airport offers 24-hour airport transfers.
Guests can work out at the hotel’s gym or relax in the steam and sauna area. Luggage storage services are available at the 24-hour front desk. The hotel also has meeting and banquet facilities.
The Oopen Restaurant serves breakfast from 04:30 12:00 and features an open kitchen. A selection of beer, tea and coffee, along with Eastern and Western dishes can be ordered here.

Situated in Ho Chi Minh City and with Giac Lam Pagoda reachable within 3.3 km, Hà Nội Hotel features express check-in and check-out, allergy-free rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and an ATM. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.
Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet or a à la carte breakfast.
Tan Dinh Market is 4.3 km from Hà Nội Hotel, while War Remnants Museum is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International, 7 km from the hotel, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

Cola's Homestay in Ho Chi Minh City is located 1.3 km from War Remnants Museum and provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, as well as access to a terrace.
Popular points of interest near the homestay include Ben Thanh Street Food Market, Reunification Palace and Tao Dan Park. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International, 12 km from Cola's Homestay, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

GK Central Hotel is a modern property placed within the city centre itself. Only 300 m from Ben Thanh Market, the hotel offers free Wi-Fi access and a private restaurant.
Air-conditioned rooms at GK Central Hotel come equipped with a flat-screen TV, seating area and wardrobe. Complete with a bathtub or shower area, bathrooms are en suite.
A 24-hour front desk will be happy to assist with luggage storage space and ironing/laundry services. For convenience, the hotel can arrange for airport shuttle services at a surcharge.

Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units include a seating area where you can relax. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries. Free WiFi is available in all rooms and throughout the whole property.
Diamond Plaza is 200 m from Hotel Des Arts Saigon Mgallery Coll, while Notre Dame Church is 400 m from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 6 km from the property.

Situated in Ho Chi Minh City, 3 km from Landmark 81, My Life Thảo Điền features accommodation with a bar, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.
Vietnam History Museum is 6 km from the accommodation, while Union Square Saigon Shopping Mall is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 16 km from My Life Thảo Điền.

Located in a quiet corner of Ho Chi Minh City, Silverland Jolie Hotelboasts views of the Saigon River and Bach Dang Pier. The hotel has an outdoor hot tub and bar on the rooftop, as well as houses a restaurant and spa centre.
Decorated in a colonial style with lovely white furniture, the air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Free tea, coffee, and bottled water are provided daily. The private bathrooms offer a bathtub and shower.
Guests can enjoy massages, manicures and pedicures, or hair treatments at KL Spa. Staff can arrange city tours, airport transfers, and laundry services. A small business centre provides fax/photocopying and internet services.

All well-appointed units are adorned in pleasant cream shade with splashes of grey and light beige from the farbics, and fitted with large bay windows enjoying sweeping views of the city or river. Spacious units also come equipped with a seating area with sofa, cable flat-screen TV and personal safe. En suite bathroom has a bathtub, shower and free toiltries.
Within walking distance, guests can reach many popular tourist attractions of the city, including the iconic Bitexco Financial Tower, Opera House, City Hall and Ben Thanh Market. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is a 30-minute drive from Renaissance Riverside Hotel Saigon.
Viet Kitchen features modern dining setting and serves a wide range of Vietnamese  and international dishes, while Kabin offers authentic Cantonese cuisine. Guests can unwind at the Liquid Sky Bar on the rooftop, or enjoy a favourite beverage at Atrium Lounge.

On the banks of the scenic Saigon River, the 4-star Riverside Serviced Apartments come with free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and 2 tennis courts. A free scheduled boat or bus transfer brings guests to and from Bach Dang Port.
Spread over 13 buildings, the air-conditioned apartments all come with a living room and full kitchen facilities. A cable TV, oven and stove are included. A private balcony enjoys views of the garden or river.  En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower.
The hotel is a 45-minute drive from Saigon Train Station and a 25-minute drive from Tan Son Nhat International Airport. Parking is free.

Located within 400 m of Tan Dinh Market in Ho Chi Minh City, Emerald Central offers a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Sai Gon Square 3 - Hai Ba Trung is 1.1 km from the hotel and Diamond Plaza is 2 km away.
Jade Emperor Pagoda is 2 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International Airport, 4.9 km from the property.

With lake views, Luxury Vinhomes Central Park (Jenny home) is situated in Ho Chi Minh City and has a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk, bar, garden, children's playground and sun terrace. Complimentary WiFi is available.
Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area.
Landmark 81 is 700 m from the apartment, while Vietnam History Museum is 2.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International, 15 km from Luxury Vinhomes, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Located in Ho Chi Minh City and with Tan Dinh Market reachable within 5 km, Air Star Hotel provides a shared lounge, allergy-free rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a garden. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests.
The accommodation offers a sun terrace.
Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar.

Valentine Hotel Saigon- Bùi Viện Street is located centrally in District 1, Ho Chi Minh City. It is less than 8 minutes' walk from Ben Thanh Market. Its modern guestrooms feature free Wi-Fi.
Fitted with wooden furnishings, air-conditioned guestrooms all come with a flat-screen cable TV and en suite bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. A hairdryer and 2 free bottles of water are provided daily.
Valentine Hotel Saigon- Bùi Viện Street offers an airport shuttle service at a charge and a ticketing desk where tour information is available. Guests can check their e-mail at the business centre in the lobby. Free photocopying and fax services are available.

Conveniently situated in Ho Chi Minh city centre, Prostyle Hotel Ho Chi Minh provides contemporary accommodation in District 1. Featuring an on-site restaurant, the hotel also has a sauna room and business centre.
Featuring free WiFi access, all rooms are furnished with air conditioning, a seating area with desk and personal safe. A satellite TV and minibar are provided. En suite bathroom in each room has a bathtub or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Extras include bathrobes and slippers for your convenience.
The hotel operates a 24-hour front desk where bilingual staff can assist with currency exchange, luggage storage and express check-in or check-out. Car rental, airport transfers, shuttle services and day trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Free private parking is possible on site.

Local attractions including the Saigon River, Reunification Palace, Opera House and Notre Dame Cathedral are 1.5 km away. Tan Son Nhat International Airport is a 45-minute drive from Pullman Saigon Centre.
Guests can work out at the hotel’s fitness centre or relax at the sauna and spa pool. Luggage storage services are available at the 24-hour reception.
The rooftop restaurant serves breakfast and has a unique circle grill concept and live show kitchen. A selection of Vietnamese beer, tea and coffee along with Eastern and Western dishes can be ordered from the lobby bar.

Situated in Ho Chi Minh City, within 1 km of War Remnants Museum and 1.2 km of Reunification Palace, Aurora Serviced Apartments features accommodation with a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, room service and currency exchange for guests.
You can play darts at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling.
Popular points of interest near Aurora Serviced Apartments include Tao Dan Park, Ho Chi Minh City Museum and Ben Thanh Street Food Market. The nearest airport is Tan Son Nhat International, 12 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Near several shopping and entertainment options it is also close to major attractions, such as, Notre Dame Cathedral and Reunification Palace.
Take a swim or work-out in the fitness centre to recharge. You can also relax with a massage offered at Sofitel Saigon Plaza.
Enjoy a buffet spread of Asian and western fare at Mezz and sample French Provence cuisine at L'Oliver Restaurant. Sofitel Saigon Plaza also has 2 bars where you can enjoy a refreshing cocktail.

Stylish rooms, studios and suites offer spacious interiors with modern amenities. Each includes an iPod dock, tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All come with a large marble bathroom.
Saigon Cafe features international cuisine coupled with authentic local flavours. Chinese and Cantonese specialities can be enjoyed at Li Bai Restaurant. Light meals and refreshing coffee drinks can be found at The Lounge. Guests can end a long day with a cocktail at the rooftop bar.
Hotel Saigon & Towers Sheraton is 800 m from Notre Dame Cathedral and the Saigon Centre. It is 2 km from War Remnants Museum, 5 km from Cholon Chinatown, and 6.5 km from Tan Son Nhat international Airport.

Situated in the backpacker’s area, Eden Garden Hotel is about 1 km from Ben Thanh Market and Reunification Palace. It houses a spa and features a daily buffet breakfast and complimentary Wi-Fi access.
City view rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels, an electric kettle and a minibar. The en suite bathroom offers toiletries and slippers.
Open from 06:00 to 20:30, the restaurant serves local Vietnamese delights alongside Western favourites. Room service is provided.

Situated in Ho Chi Minh City, Cherry Hotel and Apartment offers accommodation 5 km from Giac Lam Pagoda and 6 km from Dam Sen Cultural Park. Free WiFi is available.
The apartment offers a terrace.
Guests can enjoy the indoor pool at Cherry Hotel and Apartment.
